name: Midnight Hell
description:
Every Halloween the demons awake with only one purpose: To kill all living things.

One Daemon Rebelled... you will have to save the earth from this invasion!

Midnight Hell was created for the Itch.Io game jam by 2 people with huge love for retro gaming.

The game is still in development and we provide here with first public alpha version. We are working on new features and we will publish a new build soon.

We will be happy to hear from you what you would like to see in the next build.

Enjoy!
